Class Employee

Logic.Employee

  • Constructor Details

    • Employee

      public Employee()
      Name: Employee Purpose: Default constructor Effect: Creates an empty employee object

    • Employee

      public Employee(int employeeId, String firstName, String surname, char gender, String address, int payLevel)
      Name: Employee Purpose: Constructor to create an employee without assigning a department
      Parameters:
      employeeId - - autogenerated employee ID
      firstName - - employee's first name
      surname - - employee's last name
      gender - - 'M' or 'F' representing the employee's gender
      address - - employee's address
      payLevel - - salary level of the employee Effect: Initializes an employee object and auto-generates a unique ID

    • Employee

      public Employee(int employeeId, String firstName, String surname, char gender, String address, int payLevel, int deptID)
      Name: Employee Purpose: Constructor to create an employee with all details including department assignment.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - - unique identifier for the employee (auto generated)
      firstName - - employee's first name
      surname - - employee's last name
      gender - - 'M' or 'F' representing the employee's gender
      address - - employee's address
      payLevel - - salary level of the employee
      deptID - - ID of the department the employee belongs to Effect: Initializes an employee object with the provided information and sets isHead to false by default.

    • isIsHead

      public boolean isIsHead()
      Checks if the employee is the head of a department.
      Returns:
      true if the employee is a department head; false otherwise

    • setIsHead

      public void setIsHead(boolean isHead)
      Sets the department head status of the employee.
      Parameters:
      isHead - true if the employee is a department head; false otherwise
